title: What is IIT JEE?
text: The Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) is an engineering entrance exam conducted in two phases: JEE Main and JEE Advanced. Physics Wallah provides structured preparation for both stages.

title: JEE Main Syllabus Coverage
text: Physics Wallah's study material covers the entire JEE Main syllabus for Physics, Chemistry, and Maths, aligned with NTA’s latest pattern.

title: JEE Advanced Focused Material
text: PW offers advanced-level problems and concept boosters designed to target the tough questions of JEE Advanced.

title: NCERT-Aligned Theory
text: All foundational topics in PW’s IIT JEE courses are strictly aligned with NCERT, which is the base for JEE Main.

title: Previous Year Question Practice
text: PW includes chapter-wise PYQ sets with detailed solutions to help students understand frequently asked concepts.

title: Daily Practice Problems (DPP)
text: JEE students at PW receive DPPs after every concept, containing problems from easy to advanced levels to ensure mastery.

title: Full-Length Test Series
text: Physics Wallah conducts weekly full-syllabus mock tests for JEE Main and Advanced with detailed performance analytics.

title: JEE Formula Sheets
text: Quick-access formula sheets are provided for Physics, Chemistry, and Math — ideal for revision before mocks or boards.

title: JEE Revision Booster
text: PW provides crash revision packs and daily revision planners for last 45 days before JEE Main and Advanced.

title: High-Concept Clarity Lectures
text: PW focuses on conceptual clarity using visual methods, real-life examples, and derivation-based learning for JEE topics.

title: JEE Question Bank
text: Access a comprehensive question bank categorized by topic, difficulty, and previous year occurrence — with explanations.

title: Maths Visualizer Tools
text: Interactive tools help students visualize 3D graphs and calculus curves to master the toughest JEE Math questions.

title: JEE Mentorship Programs
text: Dedicated mentors guide students on exam strategy, time management, and mock performance reviews.

title: Topic-wise JEE Analysis
text: Topic-wise weightage and trend analysis of past JEE papers help students prioritize their preparation.

title: Subjective Answer Writing
text: For board alignment, PW includes subjective writing practice in Physics and Chemistry, with teacher evaluation.

title: Online vs Offline JEE Coaching
text: PW’s hybrid model combines the convenience of online coaching with the discipline of offline support centres.

title: Dropper Batch Info
text: PW offers dedicated dropper batches for JEE aspirants who are taking a second attempt, with repeat-friendly content pacing.

title: JEE Eligibility Criteria
text: Students must have passed Class 12 with Physics, Chemistry, and Math. There’s no age limit for JEE Main, but Advanced has two-year eligibility post-12th.

title: Boards vs JEE Study Balance
text: PW course structure balances both boards and JEE prep through dual-purpose lectures and board-centric assignments.

title: Rank Booster Series
text: In the final phase, PW runs a Rank Booster program with advanced-level mock drills, surprise tests, and mentoring to help top rankers.

title: Quick Revision Notes for JEE Physics
text: Concise revision notes for JEE Physics are provided to help students recall key formulas, concepts, and laws during last-minute prep.

title: Trick Videos for JEE Chemistry
text: PW educators share shortcut techniques and memory aids for complex Chemistry topics like Organic reaction mechanisms and Inorganic exceptions.

title: Topper Testimonials and Tips
text: Hear from past JEE toppers on how they cracked the exam, managed stress, and optimized their last 90 days using PW strategies.

title: One-Shot Revision Lectures
text: PW's One-Shot lectures revise an entire topic in 1–2 hours, ideal for rapid revision before mock exams.

title: JEE Advanced Error Log Practice
text: Students are encouraged to maintain an error log — a powerful tool to identify weak areas and avoid repetitive mistakes.

title: Line-by-Line NCERT for Chemistry
text: PW explains NCERT Chemistry line-by-line for both JEE and board students to ensure nothing is missed from this high-weightage source.

title: Physics Animations for Concept Building
text: JEE Physics concepts like rotational motion and waves are taught through 3D animations and simulations to improve understanding.

title: Concept-Based Chapter Assessments
text: Each JEE chapter ends with a concept-based quiz, testing not just memory but true understanding of the topic.

title: Subject-wise Rank Targets
text: PW mentors help students set subject-wise rank targets and prepare accordingly to maintain a strong overall percentile.

title: JEE Main vs Advanced – Key Differences
text: PW provides a clear comparison between JEE Main and Advanced in terms of syllabus, question types, marking, and strategy.

title: Boosting Your JEE Chemistry Score
text: Focus areas, high-yield topics, and memorization tricks are shared to help students boost their Chemistry scores.

title: PW Books vs NCERT for JEE
text: PW books go beyond NCERT in terms of depth, especially for JEE Advanced level questions and application-based learning.

title: Telegram Groups for Peer Doubts
text: PW facilitates subject-wise Telegram groups where students can ask doubts, share notes, and get help from peers or mentors.

title: JEE Maths PYQ Sets
text: Previous Year Questions from JEE Maths are arranged by topic and difficulty level with step-by-step solutions.

title: Inorganic Chemistry Scoring Tips
text: Students are guided on how to score high in Inorganic Chemistry by focusing on memory-based questions and NCERT theory.

title: Practice MCQs on PW App
text: Students can practice chapter-wise MCQs anytime using the PW Learning App, with instant scoring and solutions.

title: JEE Preparation Calendar
text: The PW study planner comes with a 12-month calendar tracking tool for planning milestones and topic completion.

title: Batch Transfer Policy
text: Students can request batch transfers based on schedule or performance review, subject to seat availability and approval.

title: Download JEE Sample Papers
text: PW provides downloadable PDFs of JEE sample papers with answer keys, matching the latest exam patterns.

title: JEE Previous Year Paper Analysis
text: PW provides detailed analysis of JEE papers from the past 10 years, highlighting question trends, difficulty levels, and high-frequency topics.

title: Organic Chemistry Tricks
text: PW offers structured organic chemistry tricks including reaction sequence shortcuts, named reactions, and GOC tips for JEE.

title: JEE Main Paper Pattern
text: JEE Main has 90 questions: 30 each in Physics, Chemistry, and Math. 75 questions are to be attempted. Understanding pattern is crucial for strategy.

title: Time Management Tips for JEE
text: PW mentors share tested daily and weekly time management plans that balance JEE study, school work, and revision.

title: 45-Day Revision Timetable
text: PW provides a structured last-phase timetable for JEE revision, covering all topics systematically in 45 days.

title: Physics Numericals Strategy
text: Learn how to break complex Physics numericals into conceptual steps using diagrams, units, and common formulas.

title: Revision Strategy for Droppers
text: Droppers should focus on PYQs, repeated test revision, and conceptual mastery through DPPs and mentorship support.

title: Maths Shortcuts and Tricks
text: PW includes formula-based shortcuts, Vedic tricks, and calculus simplification techniques to boost Maths speed and accuracy.

title: Live Doubt Clearing Sessions
text: Students can attend live sessions to get doubts solved in real-time by PW’s expert faculty.

title: Full Syllabus JEE Tests
text: These mock tests simulate the real exam environment and include detailed analysis to improve preparation.

title: Mental Health and Motivation
text: PW offers motivational sessions, stress management tips, and personal mentoring to help students stay focused.

title: Video Playback Speed Options
text: PW app allows students to control video playback speed for faster or repeated learning, aiding flexible revision.

title: Chapter-Wise Weightage
text: Chapter-wise weightage data for JEE helps students prioritize preparation for high-impact topics in each subject.

title: JEE Cheat Sheets
text: Compact notes with formulas, tricks, and summaries available as downloadable cheat sheets for quick revision.

title: JEE Sample Question Papers
text: Sample papers with detailed solutions simulate actual exam patterns and help students assess their readiness.

title: Formula Recall Quizzes
text: Quick recall quizzes ensure that students memorize and apply important formulas in Physics and Maths effectively.

title: Study Tips from PW Teachers
text: Top faculty members at PW regularly share smart study techniques, mistake-avoidance tactics, and planner hacks.

title: Topic-wise Mock Series
text: Weekly topic-wise mock tests in Physics, Chemistry, and Maths help students master each chapter step-by-step.

title: Common Mistakes in JEE Maths
text: A list of most common calculation and conceptual errors students make in JEE Maths, with tips to avoid them.

title: Score Improvement Plan
text: A targeted plan by PW that helps students boost their mock test scores through scheduled corrections and revisions.
